name: eventify-backend
description: Node.js backend powers a comprehensive event management system for Pakistan, supporting three user roles: Super Admin, Organizer, and Attendee. It handles user authentication, event lifecycle management, booking and ticketing, payments integration (JazzCash/Easypaisa), and analytics. The backend provides RESTful APIs for managing events, organizers, bookings, promotions, and reviews, while supporting features like bulk event creation, location-based event discovery, and multilingual (Urdu/English) data handling. Scalable and modular, it ensures secure data management, efficient performance, and seamless interaction with web and mobile frontend applications.
author: zain100000
